fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path of the bank logo

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: The period covered by the statement

fields.name: account_number
fields.description: The account number associated with this statement

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the account holder

fields.name: account_holder_address
fields.description: Address of the account holder

fields.name: summary.beginning_balance
fields.description: The beginning balance for the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_count
fields.description: The number of deposits made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount of all deposits made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_count
fields.description: The number of withdrawals made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount of all withdrawals made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.transactions_count
fields.description: The total number of transactions made during the statement period

fields.name: summary.ending_balance
fields.description: The ending balance for the statement period

fields.name: deposit.date
fields.description: Date of a deposit transaction

fields.name: deposit.description
fields.description: Description or reason for the deposit

fields.name: deposit.amount
fields.description: Amount of a deposit transaction

fields.name: summary.deposits_total
fields.description: Total amount of all deposits made during the statement period (calculated value)

fields.name: withdrawal.date
fields.description: Date of a withdrawal transaction

fields.name: withdrawal.description
fields.description: Description or reason for the withdrawal

fields.name: withdrawal.amount
fields.description: Amount of a withdrawal transaction

fields.name: summary.withdrawals_total
fields.description: Total amount of all withdrawals made during the statement period (calculated value)

fields.name: balance.date
fields.description: Date of a balance update

fields.name: balance.amount
fields.description: Amount of the balance at the specified date
